alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:11AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL FLAGLER AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS COUNTIES THROUGH 145 AM EDT... At 111 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Crescent Beach, or 11 miles east of Hastings, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marineland, Crescent Beach, and Butler Beach. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
